name: The Sinking Submarine
description:
Description:

Keep a sinking submarine afloat for as long as possible while also balancing your players stress level. 

Additional Information:

The stress level is indicated by the bar on the left, and the other bar shows what the water level is.

My best score is 6:06.19.

Controls:

  • E / Left Mouse Button to pick up items
  • E / Left Mouse Button to patch holes
  • E / Left Mouse Button to interact with objects
  • Q / Left Mouse Button to attack
  • F to enter fullscreen mode
